issue.title: [JAVA] Expose the ability to set lastSet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1237](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1237). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Expose the ability to set lastSet on vectors such that Mutator.setValueCount() doesn't blow away the vector if we have previously loaded it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1237?focusedCommentId=16098558) by Jacques Nadeau (jnadeau):*
Issue resolved by pull request 868
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/868>
